name: directory_UpdateImpactedResources
description: Update the navigation property impactedResources in directory

$ul: **@odata.type**
**id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**addedDateTime**: The date and time when the impactedResource object was initially associated with the recommendation.
**additionalDetails**: Additional information unique to the impactedResource to help contextualize the recommendation.
**apiUrl**: The URL link to the corresponding Azure AD resource.
**displayName**: Friendly name of the Azure AD resource.
**lastModifiedBy**: Name of the user or service that last updated the status.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: The date and time when the status was last updated.
**owner**: The user responsible for maintaining the resource.
**portalUrl**: The URL link to the corresponding Azure AD portal page of the resource.
**postponeUntilDateTime**: The future date and time when the status of a postponed impactedResource will be active again.
**rank**: Indicates the importance of the resource. A resource with a rank equal to 1 is of the highest importance.
**recommendationId**: The unique identifier of the recommendation that the resource is associated with.
**resourceType**: Indicates the type of Azure AD resource. Examples include user, application.
**status**
**subjectId**: The related unique identifier, depending on the resourceType. For example, this property is set to the applicationId if the resourceType is an application.
**error**
**code**
**details**
**innererror**
**@odata.type**
**Date**: Date when the error occured.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**message**
